plot: Romantic dark comedy sees phobia-riddled Zoe Cadwaulder (Melanie Lynskey) overcoming her fears and discovering true love.
title: The Nearly Unadventurous Life of Zoe Cadwaulder
plot_es: Romantic dark comedy sees phobia-riddled Zoe Cadwaulder (Melanie Lynskey) overcoming her fears and discovering true love.
original_name: The Nearly Unadventurous Life of Zoe Cadwaulder
plot_en: Romantic dark comedy sees phobia-riddled Zoe Cadwaulder (Melanie Lynskey) overcoming her fears and discovering true love.
